properties.address: 33 Marine Road, Isle of Bute PA20 0LL
properties.description: Open to all,offering, hot soup and bread,coffee or tea,a warm space and a chat
properties.title: WarmWelcomeWednesdays

hours._text: Monday to Friday 9.00am to 5.00pm , as a warm space for 16- to 25-year-olds.; Lunch will be served at 1.00pm on Mon, Wed and Thursday . Tea, Coffee and Hot Chocolate will be available daily, and an activity programme will run, including Arts and crafts, pottery, sewing, cooking, and Movie afternoons. There is a computer and free internet access, and a pool table.

properties.address: The Anchor Tavern, 33 Marine Road, Port Bannatyne, Isle of Bute, PA20 0LL
properties.description: Everyone, including children are welcome! The soup is free but please give a donation if you can afford it so they can continue to help each other. You don’t need any particular reason to go other than fancying some food, some company and a bit of warmth.
properties.title: Port Gala Team
